articles.title: Children continue to be at risk of lead exposure in Port Pirie and documents reveal a clean-up plan was unlikely to have any major impact - ABC News
articles.description: Karen Davis does everything she can to reduce her son's exposure to lead levels but they keep going up and now documents seen by the ABC show authorities knew a program to bring down blood levels in the town of Port Pirie was unlikely to have any major impact.
articles.content:
In the kitchen of her suburban home, young mum Karen Davis is perched over a high chair holding a biscuit.

articles.title: Onyx Boox Note2 Review - PCMag
articles.description: The Onyx Boox Note2 is a large-format E Ink reader that can show pretty much any document you need, and it doubles as an Android tablet and a second monitor.
articles.content: Bigger can be better. Onyx has long made a name in the niche world of large-format E Ink tablets, providing big-screen devices to people who want to read pages that look too cramped on Kindles and Ko… [+9748 chars]

articles.title: Lorex 1080p Smart Indoor Wi-Fi Security Camera - PCMag AU
articles.description: The Lorex Smart Indoor Wi-Fi Camera is an affordable home security cam that offers sharp 1080p video, voice control, and local storage for video triggered by motion and sound.
